column3: はぁ はぁ はぁ はぁ……
はぁ はぁ はぁ はぁ……
はぁ はぁ はぁ……っ……
どうして こんな事に……
column4: How did it come to this?

column3:
厄災に……
ガノンに奪われるなんて……
column4: Calamity Ganon.It turned them all against us!

column3: うあぁぁぁぁ……うぅっ……うぅっ……あぁぁぁぁ……

神獣が……
ガーディアンが……

ダルケルも リ―バルも ミファーも……
ウルボザも きっともう神獣の中で……
column4: And everyone—Mipha, Urbosa, Revali and Daruk...They're all trapped inside those things...

column3:
封印の力に目覚められず……

ガノンに立ち向かう筈の遺物達まで奪われ……
column4:
Our only hope for defeating Ganon is lost all because
I couldn't harness this cursed power!

column3:
私が……
私が今までして来た事は……
何の役にも立たなかった……
column4: Everything—everything I've done up until now...It was all for nothing...
So I really am just a failure!

column3:
民を……
仲間を……
御父様を……
column4: All my friends...the entire kingdom...my father most of all...
I tried, and I failed them all...
